title: Proud Boy ties record for the longest Jan. 6 sentence in seditious conspiracy case
description: Proud Boy Ethan Nordean sentenced to 18 years in federal prison for his role in the Capitol riot, tying for the longest sentence in a Jan. 6 case so far.

title: Bodycam footage shows moments before pregnant woman's fatal shooting by Ohio police officer
description: Body camera footage showing the moments before the fatal shooting last week of a pregnant woman by an Ohio police officer was released Friday.

title: To lighten the pressure of posting, some Instagram users embrace 'sneaky' posts
description: Posting to Instagram can be a stressful experience for Ila Kumar.

title: Ruby Franke’s sisters speak out on social media after Utah YouTuber’s arrest on child abuse charges
description: Two of Ruby Franke's sisters have spoken out on social media after the Utah YouTuber was arrested on abuse charges this week, when officials reported a child was found with signs of malnutrition, open wounds and duct tape on their extremities.

title: Tucker Carlson stokes conspiracies, claims U.S. is 'speeding towards' assassination of Trump
description: Tucker Carlson said this week that the U.S. is “speeding towards” the assassination of former President Donald Trump.

title: Family who went 'off the grid' in Colorado wilderness died of malnutrition, autopsy finds
description: Two sisters and a teenage son who told family last year they would live 'off the grid' died of hypothermia and malnutrition as they endured the elements in the Colorado wilderness.

title: Why Hurricane Idalia's destruction skipped some homes along Florida's coast
description: Hurricane Idalia damaged dozens of homes along the Big Bend coast of Florida but others survived were relatively relatively unscathed thanks to building codes.

title: New York police will use drones to monitor backyard parties this weekend, spurring privacy concerns
description: Those attending outdoor parties or barbecues in New York City this weekend may notice an uninvited guest looming over their festivities: a police surveillance drone.

title: Proud Boy who smashed Capitol window with stolen police shield to be sentenced
description: A Proud Boy who smashed a Capitol window with a stolen police riot shield will be sentenced in federal court on Friday morning.

title: Pentagon officials debate whether to replace extra U.S. troops deployed to Eastern Europe or bring them home
description: Pentagon officials have been debating whether to replace 4,000 U.S. troops deployed to Eastern Europe to support NATO and deter Russia, with some saying they're no longer needed.

title: Biden delivers remarks on the August jobs report
description: Watch live coverage as President Biden delivers remarks on the August jobs report that showed the U.S. economy added 187,000 jobs last month.

title: California’s Democratic leaders escalate fights with conservative school boards
description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom and other top Democrats are fighting back against school board policies banning books and restricting support for LGBTQ students.

title: Ads for AI sex workers are flooding Instagram and TikTok
description: AI Apps promising sexual images are running hundreds of ads on social media. Human sex workers are often banned. Companies are following the success of ChatGPT.

title: U.S. troops will stay at the southern border at least through Sept. 30
description: Hundreds of U.S. troops whose deployment to the southern border was extended until Aug. 31 will now stay at least another month. There have been troops at the border since May.

title: China’s new map outrages its neighbors
description: A new map published by China that lays claim to almost all of the South China Sea has been rejected by the Philippines, Malaysia, Vietnam, Taiwan and India.

title: White House ramps up war room to battle expected GOP impeachment inquiry
description: The White House has stood up a war room to lead an aggressive response to a likely Republican impeachment inquiry into President Joe Biden, an aide said.

title: Number of missing in Maui wildfires will fall to double digits, governor says
description: The number of people missing after the Maui wildfires is expected to drop into the double digits, Hawaii Gov. Josh Green said.

title: Trump campaign aide told police officers to 'go hang yourself' at Jan. 6 riot
description: Dylan Quattrucci, the No. 2 official in New Hampshire on Donald Trump's campaign told police to kill themselves in a Jan. 6 video shot in close proximity to the Capitol.
